doc.title: Igenamiterere ryisi yose
doc.excludeDomains: Ongeramo amazina ya domaine kugirango usibye. Izina rimwe gusa rishobora kongerwaho icyarimwe.

example.domain: Urashobora kongeramo izina rya domaine, nka {{url}} , kugirango ukureho izina ryose.
example.url: Urashobora gukuramo amahuza yihariye wongeyeho umurongo, nka {{url}} .
example.glob: Urashobora kongeramo {{glob}} icyitegererezo, nka {{minimatch}} , kugirango uhuze fuzzy.

doc.script: Urashobora kandi gukoresha inyandiko za js kugirango ugere kubuhanga buhanitse.
doc.checkedUseScript: Niba ushobora gukora inyandiko yawe, menya ko ugomba kugenzura ibisanduku byombi icyarimwe kugirango ushoboze inyandiko.

example1.commentTitle: Kugeza ubu kurubuga rwa {{youtube}}, ugomba gufungura {{youtube}} '{{kureba}} cyangwa {{ikabutura}} kurupapuro rushya.
example1.page: : Impinduka ni URL ya page yurubuga rwubu. Kubisobanuro birambuye, <a href = 'https: //developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/URL' intego = '_ ubusa' rel = 'noreferrer'> Nyamuneka reba </ a>
example1.isSameSubDomain: . imiryangoSubDomain}} uko bikurikirana. Amazina yabo ya domaine aratandukanye.
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} uburyo bwo guhuza, ukoresheje isomero rya {{minimatch}}, uburyo bwo gukoresha Nyamuneka Reba , cyangwa urashobora gushakisha uburyo wakoresha {{glob}}.
example1.rightTab: : Ihuza rifungura muri tab nshya iburyo
example1.wholeCode: Ibisobanuro bya code yose ni uko kuri ubu kuri page ya {{www}} page yizina ya YouTube, niba kanda ihuza ni izina rimwe kandi inzira itangirana na {{kureba}} cyangwa {{ikabutura}}, hanyuma tab nshya urupapuro iburyo ruzakingurwa.
